#summary Describes how to develop MxUpdate Update Deployment Tool

= Install Eclipse Project =

  * Use the Maven Eclipse Plug-In
  * In Eclipse create a new SVN project using the {{{trunc}}} directory.
  * Copy {{{eMatrixServletRMI.jar}}} and {{{FcsClient.jar}}} from your MX installation into the directory {{{lib}}}.

The Jar file must be copied to defined place, or Apache Maven could not compile and test the MxUpdate Update tool.

= Upload new Version to Google Code Downloads =
The Maven goal "{{{gcupload:gcupload}}}" is used to upload a new !MxUpdate Update version to the the downloads at the !MxUpdate Google Code page. To use this Maven goal in the user specific {{{setting.xml}}} file following properties must be defined:
{{{
<settings>
    :
  <servers>
       :
    <server>
      <id>googlecode</id>
      <username>[YOUR_GOOGLE_ACCOUNT_NAME]</username>
      <password>[SVN_PASSWORD_FROM_PROFILE]</password>
    </server>
       :
  </servers>
    :
</settings>
}}}
